official.headline: System Reset Initiated
official.anchor_line: Citywide BCI scoring and controls are paused for two weeks of maintenance.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary suspension of the Behavioral Compliance Index ensures the continued reliability and fairness of Stenograd's digital society.

official.headline: Community Steps Forward
official.anchor_line: Residents demonstrate unity through orderly local assemblies and resource sharing.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd citizens show resilience by maintaining order and harmony while core systems are updated.

official.headline: Debate Shapes Future
official.anchor_line: Public calls grow for a refreshed approach as BCI returns.
official.contextual_reframing: This civic discussion proves our society adapts calmly and wisely to new challenges.

underground.headline: BCI Goes Dark
underground.anchor_line: The city's all-seeing BCI is down and nobody knows who's really in charge.
underground.contextual_reframing: Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, normally tracks everything. With it off, people are suddenly making real choices—and power struggles are boiling beneath the surface.

underground.headline: Neighborhoods Take Over
underground.anchor_line: With the algorithms gone, ordinary people are fixing, feeding, and protecting their own blocks.
underground.contextual_reframing: Districts ignored by the BCI system now step up as the ‘machine’ goes silent. The Council says it’s ‘orderly’—but real survival means trusting neighbors over screens.

underground.headline: Division on Display
underground.anchor_line: Some want the BCI back. Others say never again. The fight for Stenograd's future just got real.
underground.contextual_reframing: Algorithmic rule—from jobs to food—was the old normal. Now, every choice and every voice matters. What happens if the Council tries to restart the system?
